page.title: 02VILLAGE LIFE IN WESTONING:2
page.content: Westoning has an active{Recreation {Club,}based at the{recreation ground} in the centre of the village. The clubhouse is the headquarters of the village's{cricket}and{football}teams. There are three{Public Houses}in Westoning:-The Chequers, The Nags Head and the Bell. For the ladies of the village there is a{Womens Institute,}and for the senior citizens a{Golden Age}club. The various clubs and societies meet in the Old School building in Church Road, which is administered by the Spensley Trust. A monthly{Church Magazine}keeps the villagers in touch with local events.
